sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background image

sub_fields.label: Background Image Repeat
sub_fields.name: background_image_repeat
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the background should repeat.

sub_fields.label: Background Image Position
sub_fields.name: background_image_position
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the x and y positions for the background image. Values can be entered as left, right, or center - or by using percentage values (e.g. 25% 50%) or pixel values (e.g. 100px 200px)

sub_fields.label: Background Image Size
sub_fields.name: background_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Default is auto. To use custom values, enter either percentage (e.g. 75%) or pixel values (e.g. 100px 200px)

sub_fields.label: First Column Width
sub_fields.name: first_column_width
sub_fields.instructions: Left column width dictates right column width

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a background image

sub_fields.label: Background Image Repeat
sub_fields.name: background_image_repeat
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the background should repeat.

sub_fields.label: Background Image Position
sub_fields.name: background_image_position

sub_fields.label: Background Image Size
sub_fields.name: background_image_size
sub_fields.instructions: Default is auto. To use custom values, enter either percentage (e.g. 75%) or pixel values (e.g. 100px 200px)

sub_fields.label: Content Type
sub_fields.name: content_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose what kind of content you want to add to your column

sub_fields.label: Text Size
sub_fields.name: text_size
sub_fields.instructions: Choose either a header size or enter a custom font size - size values should be entered in pixeld (e.g. 14px)

sub_fields.label: Include Image on Mobile?
sub_fields.name: include_image_on_mobile
sub_fields.instructions: Should this image be displayed on mobile devices?

sub_fields.label: Client Logo
sub_fields.name: client_logo
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a client logo

sub_fields.label: Client
sub_fields.name: client
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which client to add to the logo grid

sub_fields.label: What kind of post feed do you want to add?
sub_fields.name: feed_type
sub_fields.instructions: Pinned posts are added manually and do not change. A dynamic post feed will pull the most recent posts. If both pinned and dynamic posts are selected, the pinned posts will appear at the top of the feed.

choices.Pinned Posts and Dynamic Post Feed: Pinned Posts and Dynamic Post Feed

sub_fields.label: Number of Posts to Include
sub_fields.name: number_of_posts_to_include
sub_fields.instructions: How many posts do you want to add?

conditional_logic.value: Pinned Posts and Dynamic Post Feed

sub_fields.label: Included Post Types
sub_fields.name: included_post_types
sub_fields.instructions: Select the types of posts you want to include in the feed

conditional_logic.value: Pinned Posts and Dynamic Post Feed
Pinned Posts and Dynamic Post Feed

sub_fields.label: Subscribe Form Shortcode
sub_fields.name: subscribe_form_shortcode
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the shortcode for the subscribe form. (*This can be found in the Form Settings in the MailChimp for WP Plugin)
